Name: Kuro Neko
About the game: Kuro Neko is a 2D platformer. In Kuro Neko you have got lost and you must find your way home by collecting oil lanterns and avoiding monsters. In 4 player battle you see who can survive until the end. Controls: Player 1: Left: A Key Right: D Key Jump: Space BAr Player 2: Left: Left Key Right: Right Key Jump: N Key Player 3: Left: G Key Right: J Key Jump: O Key Player 4: Left: 4 Num Key Right: 6 Num Key Jump: PG Up Key Single Player also works with an Xbox Controller
